price: 199. Puis déferlez d’où les gens ont (toujours) déferlé,[69] et demandez le pardon d’Allah car Allah est Absoluteur et Tout Miséricordieux.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَفِيضُواْ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ أَفَاضَ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma afīḍū min ḥaythu afāḍa al-nāsu wa-is'taghfirū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
